abstract.t: This document specifies mechanisms for the internationalization of vObject content and its realization in vFormat. This document updates the following specifications: o I-D.calconnect-vobject-vformat, The vObject Model and vFormat Syntax o RFC 6350, vCard version 4.0 o RFC 5545, Internet Calendaring and Scheduling Core Object Specification (iCalendar) o RFC 7953, Calendar Availability Extensions This work is produced by the CalConnect TC-VCARD and TC-CALENDAR committees.
